sentences.en: A more efficient technique is to sterilize the attracted insects.
sentences.cn: 一种比较有效的方法是使被吸引的昆虫绝育.

sentences.en: Antiseptic is used to sterilize the skin before giving an injection.
sentences.cn: 杀菌剂被用于在注射前给皮肤消毒.

sentences.en: Function: Remove comedo and dead cell , Oil control, Lavender disinfect & sterilize .
sentences.cn: 功效: 清除脸部的黑头、角质 、 控制油脂的分泌、收缩毛孔, 消毒 杀菌.

sentences.en: He prick the blister on his heel with a sterilize needle.
sentences.cn: 他用一根消过毒的针扎破他脚后跟上的水円.

sentences.en: He pricks the blister on his heel with a sterilize needle.
sentences.cn: 他用一根消过毒的针扎破他脚后跟上的水泡.

sentences.en: Healthy material feels soft and comfortable and free and can sterilize.
sentences.cn: 手感柔软,健康材料,透气杀菌,穿着舒适.

sentences.en: I'll just use this swab to sterilize it.
sentences.cn: 我来用酒精棉球给你消毒一下.

sentences.en: M. why do they sterilize the needle for lethal injections?
sentences.cn: 在用注射毒剂的方式执行死型时,为什么还要用消毒钟头?

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the effect of ozone used to sterilize sickbed unit.
sentences.cn: 目的评价病床单位臭氧消毒的效果.

sentences.en: Sterilize the bottles with boiling water.
sentences.cn: 用沸水把这些瓶子消毒。

sentences.en: Sulphur is also used to sterilize equipment.
sentences.cn: 硫也可用来给器材消毒。

sentences.en: The solution is blatantly obvious, isn't it - sterilize the rich.
sentences.cn: 解决办法很明显, 不是应该给富人绝育吗?

sentences.en: They are going to sterilize our office this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他们今天下午要替我们的办公室消毒.

sentences.en: Too long the dead hand has been permitted to sterilize living thought!
sentences.cn: 死魂灵对生命之思的扼杀太久了!

sentences.en: Why do they sterilize the needle for lethal injections?
sentences.cn: 在用注射毒剂的方式执行死刑时,为什么还要消毒针头?

words.tran_cn: 用铅版印刷的；老一套的
不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的
[泌尿] 不育；[妇产] 不孕；无菌；不毛；内容贫乏
消毒，[医][食品] 杀菌；使不孕；无用状态
消毒器；消毒者；[医] 杀菌器
把…浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype的过去分词）
杀菌；消除；冻结（sterilize的过去分词）
使用铅版；套用老套，使一成不变

trans.tran_cn: 杀菌, 消毒, 使成不毛
trans.tran_en: to make something completely clean by killing any  bacteria  in it

trans.tran_cn: 消毒，使无菌，使失去生育能力，使不起作用
